00022     PreferenceDialog::PreferenceDialog(QWidget* parent) 
00023         : QDialog(parent)
00024     {
00025         setupUi(this);
00026 
00027         unsigned short int nbFormat = 0;
00028         unsigned short int nbCrypto = 0;
00029 
00030         if(ModuleManager::count()>0)
00031         {
00032             moduleListWidget->clear();
00033 
00034             QList<ModuleInterface*> moduleList = ModuleManager::getList();
00035             for(int i=0; i<moduleList.size(); i++)
00036             {
00037                 ModuleInterface* module = moduleList.at(i);
00038 
00039                 QListWidgetItem* item = new QListWidgetItem(module->name()+" ("+module->version()+")", moduleListWidget);
00040 
00041                 if(!module->status().startsWith("ok", Qt::CaseInsensitive))
00042                 {
00043                     QBrush brush(QColor(255, 225, 225));
00044                     item->setBackground(brush);
00045                     item->setToolTip(module->status().section("|", 1, 1));
00046                 }
00047 
00048                 ModuleManager::Category cat = ModuleManager::getCategory(module);
00049                 if(cat == ModuleManager::IMAGEFORMAT)
00050                 {
00051                     item->setIcon(QPixmap(":/icons/img/imageformat.png"));
00052                     imageFormatComboBox->addItem(module->typeSupported());
00053                     m_imageFormatMap[module->typeSupported()] = nbFormat++;
00054                 }else if(cat == ModuleManager::CRYPTO){
00055                     item->setIcon(QPixmap(":/icons/img/crypto.png"));
00056                     cryptoComboBox->addItem(module->typeSupported());
00057                     m_cryptoMap[module->typeSupported()] = nbCrypto++;
00058                 }
00059             }
00060         }
00061 
00062         this->setConfig();
00063 
00064         connect(this, SIGNAL(accepted()), this, SLOT(accepted()));
00065         connect(this, SIGNAL(rejected()), this, SLOT(rejected()));
00066         connect(outputToolButton, SIGNAL(pressed()), this, SLOT(selectFile()));
00067     }
00068 
00069     void PreferenceDialog::setConfig()
00070     {
00071         outputLineEdit->setText(Controller::config.get("output"));
00072 
00073         if(m_imageFormatMap.contains(Controller::config.get("imageformat")))
00074         {
00075             imageFormatComboBox->setCurrentIndex(
00076                                                  m_imageFormatMap[Controller::config.get("imageformat")]
00077                                                  );
00078         }
00079         else
00080             imageFormatComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
00081 
00082         if(m_cryptoMap.contains(Controller::config.get("encryption")))
00083         {
00084             cryptoComboBox->setCurrentIndex(
00085                                             m_cryptoMap[Controller::config.get("encryption")]
00086                                             );
00087         }
00088         else
00089             cryptoComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
00090 
00091         if(Controller::config.get("charset")=="Latin1")
00092             charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(1);
00093         else if(Controller::config.get("charset")=="ASCII")
00094             charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(2);
00095         else
00096             charsetComboBox->setCurrentIndex(0);
00097     }
00098 
00099     void PreferenceDialog::accepted()
00100     {
00101         Controller::config.set("output", outputLineEdit->text());
00102         Controller::config.set("imageformat", imageFormatComboBox->currentText());
00103         Controller::config.set("charset", charsetComboBox->currentText());
00104         Controller::config.set("encryption", cryptoComboBox->currentText());
00105         Controller::config.save();
00106     }
00107 
00108     void PreferenceDialog::rejected()
00109     {
00110         setConfig();
00111     }
00112 
00113     void PreferenceDialog::selectFile()
00114     {
00115         setCursor(Qt::WaitCursor);
00116         QFileDialog dialog(this, tr("Select default output dir"));
00117         dialog.setViewMode(QFileDialog::List);
00118         dialog.setFileMode(QFileDialog::DirectoryOnly);
00119         dialog.setDirectory(QDir::homePath());
00120         if(dialog.exec())
00121         {
00122             QStringList fileNames = dialog.selectedFiles();
00123             if(fileNames.size()>0)
00124             {
00125                 if(QFile::exists(fileNames.at(0)))
00126                     outputLineEdit->setText(fileNames.at(0));
00127                 else
00128                     QMessageBox::warning(this, tr("Warning"),
00129                                          fileNames.at(0)+"\n"+
00130                                          "The folder selected doesn't exists.\n"+
00131                                          "Please select an other destination !");
00132             }
00133         }
00134         setCursor(Qt::ArrowCursor);
00135     }
